article_metadata.description: Buoyancy in business sentiments backed by improvement in economic indicators makes us believe that companies will require consultants for advice and guidance. We expect that consultancies will increase hiring to meet the rising demand, and both profit and revenue will improve in the coming quarters.
article_metadata.author: Great Speculations

og.description: Buoyancy in business sentiments backed by improvement in economic indicators makes us believe that companies will require consultants for advice and guidance. We expect that consultancies will increase hiring to meet the rising demand, and both profit and revenue will improve in the coming quarters.
og.title: Reviewing Accenture's Management Consulting Division
